amendment.description: To accelerate the removal or security of fissile materials, radiological materials, and related equipment at vulnerable sites worldwide.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3162 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3162 proposed by Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S5582, S5594) To accelerate the removal or security of fissile materials, radiological materials, and related equipment at vulnerable sites worldwide.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3162 proposed by Senator Domenici.
